        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="258" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="258" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.79</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="5613">5,613</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="557"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Eternity For Men</b> by <b>Calvin Klein</b> is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. <b>Eternity For Men</b> was launched in 1990. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlos Benaïm. Top notes are Lavender, Lemon, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Sage, Juniper Berries, Basil, Geranium, Jasmine, Coriander, Orange Blossom, Lily-of-the-Valley and Lily; base notes are Sandalwood, Musk, Vetiver, Brazilian Rosewood and Amber. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end;   <span>
    This perfume reminds me of
  </span>
</div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2353898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353898" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glowberry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2267908"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2267908.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glowberry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Penguin-88917.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88917.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Penguin"title="Penguin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353898ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353898" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2267908">Glowberry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 01:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yet another gifted fragrance from my dads vanity. This is a sweet and bright citrusy scent with a hidden spice from the coriander that slowly comes out as it dries on your skin. It doesn't change too much from spray to the end of day. Its a little dated smelling, but not so much compared to some things I've smelled recently. Totally wearable today. I wear it every now and then. Its definitely a summer scent, very citrusy and fresh. It sometimes gives me a headache but that's just me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2353898"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2353898#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340413" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340413" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fuujied"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2296903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2296903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fuujied" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340413ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340413" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2296903">fuujied</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 21:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore the scent. Spicy and just slightly citrusy, nice and masculine. Not the most mature scent. Has rather disappointing longevity, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2340413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2340413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2330917" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330917" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jcarolinajr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329594.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="jcarolinajr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Pi-39.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pi"title="Pi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330917ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330917" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); If not for being overly synthetic and a bit cloying, it would be very pleasant. 6.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2328380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2328380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2328041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328041" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="G&ouml;khan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2172593.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="G&ouml;khan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328041ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328041" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172593">G&ouml;khan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 03:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Zamansız oldugunu düşünmüyorum. Eski usul aromatik ve citrus kokusu. En önemli olayı rosewood, gul ağacı hayraniysaniz belki deneyebilirsiniz. Fiyat olarak da iyi .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2328041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2328041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323467" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="McSarel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884710"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="McSarel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Black-1197.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1197.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Black"title="Polo Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884710">McSarel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 00:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you let it mature this is one of the best smelling fragrances of all time. In my opion!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2323467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2323467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317570" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317570" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoirMemoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoirMemoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ana-Abiyedh-Leather-82062.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82062.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ana Abiyedh Leather "title="Ana Abiyedh Leather "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317570ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317570" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296">NoirMemoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>CK Eternity is not a fragrance you analyse for its complexity and nouances. There are no hidden emotions or messages to discover within, no layers to peel off, no depths to explore. Its a classic men's fragrance for all day, everyday. Its yesteryear's go getter, working man's fragrance but don't get it twisted, it doesn't smell dated. <br />
<br />
Eternity smells fresh and clean, very airy, green, pleasantly herbal and soapy. It feels mellow in the sense that nothing is overaccentuated, the citruses and the green accord feel almost aquatic because of this fact.<br />
<br />
Don't expect strong performance. I would recommend it to those looking for an easy going day scent that is not in the blue shower-gel or sweet amber-woody category nor in the sharp-harsh hairy-chested 80's style. <br />
<br />
I would describe CK's Eternity as a "transition" scent between old school and the modern era of men's fragrances, a child of the 90's but not out of place even today.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2317570"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2317570#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317411" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317411" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="leto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317411ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317411" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40660">leto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 05:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best perfumes that I had dismissed during my "yeah dude niche man it's best, niche" phase. But it's a phase i went through and observing a lot around, so i don't regret.<br />
<br />
All in all, took some years to appreciate the simple beauty of this classic composition.<br />
Perfectly office friendly, masculine, never smells dated (still in 2024). Citrus-lavender and a light herbal structure is the backbone of the smell.<br />
<br />
One may complain about its "performance" but it's quite okay for a desk job or for enclosed spaces and is joyful to reapply during the day. Its never cloying, gentlemanly smell is not like the recent decade's beasts, that's a fact, and god forbid, i come to hate those performers.<br />
I use both the deostick and the shower gel of it, so they contribute to the total feel.<br />
<br />
My eternal love for CK Eternity, still a very good fragrance for men. And is around what, 30 € for 100ml in most discounters, fantastic!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2317411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2317411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316324" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fkane09"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2287082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2287082.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fkane09" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2287082">Fkane09</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 07:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s boring. This is by no means a bad scent, it has all the basics you would look for in a fresh, clean scent, it definitely has an appeal factor and is ok for the price, on my skin it lacks longevity and sillage but that was as expected; I don’t wear this and it was a gift, I would recommend if you are over 30-35 and are looking for a cheap scent; if not, there are definitely better options. 3/10<br />
<br />
Edit: I have the old bottle without the atomiser</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2316324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2316324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306043" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Max Tatum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730376"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Max Tatum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kristiansand-New-York/Kristiansand-11432.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11432.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kristiansand"title="Kristiansand"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306043ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306043" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730376">Max Tatum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 14:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I consider this a classic men's cologne. If you are a man, above 30, imagine yourself in Italy, cozy summer morning, wearing white shirt, having a croissant with a cup of espresso. This is just perfect for that. You don't want to choke anyone with parfume, you want just something that will feel fresh, last through that breakfast before you decide which scent of the day to pick. And yes, this could easily be Egoiste Platinum's cousin from the countryside watered down flanker, but not in a bad way. The resemblance is undeniable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2306043"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2306043#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Invest in a vintage bottle if you find one.<br />

Any Adidas deodorant is ten times better than the new Coty formula. What a joke.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2295744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2295744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293556" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheNameIsBond , JamesBond"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2211748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheNameIsBond , JamesBond" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-9099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel"title="Bleu de Chanel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293556ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293556" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211748">TheNameIsBond , JamesBond</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 08:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A magnificent fragrance.. I absolutely love this one !! Very unique.. I am yet to smell another perfume like this..<br />
<br />
By the way, I am reviewing a 2014 bottle.. So, can't say much about the current versions..<br />
<br />
Smells sweet-citrusy, green, fresh, very lavendery and a lot like fennel seeds (which taste and smell sweet-spicy, a little earthy and leafy).. The vetiver note is used in a mild and subtle way which I like.. It kind of smells like a cross between a mojito and an absinthe.. This has a very complicated scent profile..<br />
<br />
Ideal for hot weather.. <br />
<br />
On my skin Eternity EDT lasts for more than 7 hours.. Lasts even longer (about 10 hours) if I spray it on my shirt.. Radiates at about an arm's length for about 5 or 6 hours before settling down as a skin scent...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2293556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2293556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279132" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eman72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179686"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2179686.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eman72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); My exact thoughts on this is it smells outdated. Not in a bad way but it’s got that strong barbershop vibe to it and I wouldn’t suggest this if you’re under 30. Maybe I’m just used to smelling this on him as a kid but personally if you’re young like me there’s better options. Also this would pair up good with a suit and tie, a business meeting perhaps I don’t see this as a signature scent so much</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2279132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2279132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275501" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274801" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amitsharma37"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2193227.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amitsharma37" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274801ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274801" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193227">amitsharma37</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 10:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gone in a 2 hours. If you spray heavy then you might get 4 hours. The smell is really nice. This can only work in an office environment where you are in your office the whole day. For outdoor you need to spray again after every 2,3 hours. The scent is unique and that's why it still sells. 5 stars only for the smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2274801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2274801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265345" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zbscott"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1590013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="zbscott" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1590013">zbscott</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first real fragrance I ever bought. Fresh, clean, citrusy, floral. Nothing special, but a good choice for a fine summer or spring's day. Could wear in autumn as well. Decent performance, decent scent. 6.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2265345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2265345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260641" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260641" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="patsnotmyname"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2138496"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="patsnotmyname" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260641ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260641" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2138496">patsnotmyname</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On paper, based on the notes, I should love this fragrance, but I really just don't. It may just be the combination, but I love each of the top notes INDIVIDUALLY, but when they're combined it smells just really funky and bad. I know barbershop perfumery may just not be my style, but I've known other barbershop fragrances that I like (Burberry Men), and they've just been plain good. Old-fashioned, but good.<br />
This, on the other hand, is just unpleasent. No other way to describe it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2260641"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2260641#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260464" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244912" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nuone_sen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213126.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nuone_sen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213126">nuone_sen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 09:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>CK Eternity EDT for Men opens with a citrusy, fresh, and slightly herbal aroma, complemented by notes of lavender and a hint of fresh spice. While the scent is pleasant, I’m disappointed with its projection and longevity. Unfortunately, the fragrance fades within an hour of application. Given this lack of performance, I don’t plan on repurchasing it, as it falls short of my expectations.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2244912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2244912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242326" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="William C"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902606"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="William C" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902606">William C</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 22:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A sweet and spicy scent with medium projection and longevity, CK Eternity is a solid choice for men for any occasion. I keep a small bottle in my gym and travel bags, knowing it will suffice for whatever comes next. My partner gives this EDT a thumbs up. The main downside is that Eternity has a slight detergent note that a top-tier scent would lack.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2242326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2242326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Slightly harsh/synthetic, but mellows as it dries. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235339" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1947UFO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2013611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2013611.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="1947UFO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-Ultimate-56796.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56796.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men Ultimate"title="A*Men Ultimate"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2013611">1947UFO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 00:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a mix between Mugler's Alien Man and Liz Claiborne's Lucky You. It starts off strong with the spicy profile of Alien Man, then it morphs into the mellow garden of herbs known as Lucky You. Very peculiar and I dig this. Never did smell it in the 90s but I knew it existed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2235339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2235339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224247" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Theqatarmaestro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Theqatarmaestro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224247ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224247" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); Just very citrusy and barbershoppy is what I would describe it, very basic and linear. Coniferous, juniper is so right.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2176843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2176843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174380" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Manliness.Revealed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2145581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2145581.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Manliness.Revealed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-Sport-14185.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14185.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Eau d’Issey Pour Homme Sport"title="L’Eau d’Issey Pour Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174380ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174380" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2145581">Manliness.Revealed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 05:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternity for Men by Calvin Klein is like wasabi in my rotation.  It is so fresh, clean and sensible that it clears my pallet for more upcoming wilder sushi scents.  I love it for sure, though it is boring in a way.  Eternity is entirely not challenging.  Going a full day being simply nice smelling doesn't win the secret prize but is a necessary ability in the bigger picture.  The nose did well.  "Eternity" is an occasion of considerable heft; to match up a fragrance to so bold a target reality may define a mixologist's career.  Great name, great smell - always positive when it rolls around in my rotation to wasabi clear the olfactory nerve.<br />
Especially good for general social occasions.  Can't miss, never goes wrong.  This is the scent of innocent clear conscience and good will.  When wearing Eternity, I fit in with all people of good intent, leave a trail of happy people in my wake and have to really strive to find a way to make mischief.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2174380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2174380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170535" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="delancy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595665.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="delancy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170535ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170535" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595665">delancy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 13:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>That "this perfume reminds me of" comparison to Platinum Egoiste is one of the worst "takes" I have seen on this site, and I've seen some absolute howlers on here...<br />
<br />
At the end of the day, PE and Eternity don't smell anything alike, and that's before we get to the actual quality of each. While PE has definitely been diluted by reformulations over the years, which has affected longevity/performance, it still in 2024 smells of Chanel quality in terms of the actual ingredients used and the overall quality of the fragrance. <br />
<br />
Eternity, on the other hand? Drug store cheap. This has been reformulated into a sickening, plasticky synthetic mess that belongs in the bargain bin at your local pharmacy. They've butchered this over the years into something that honestly smells like a plastic bag at times...<br />
<br />
As for the actual composition? If we're talking about what this used to be then this is the absolute textbook definition of a "classic fragrance". A true 90s icon in every sense of the word.<br />
<br />
This is pure "riding down a Miami beach boulevard during sunset on a Honda CBR 900 in 1996, Cuban shirt, on your way to a club". It's what Matt Dillon's characters in both Wild Things and There's Something About Mary would smell like and I mean that in a good way. <br />
<br />
In terms of the current formulations of "vaguely similar" fragrances from the same era, I'm picking Herrera For Men (1991), Burberry Men (1995), and Paco Rabanne XS (1994) any day over this plastic bag drug store concoction that Eternity as been butchered into.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2170535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2170535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169881" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169881" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sniff_this"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sniff_this" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169881ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169881" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); It has definitely changed over the years but it is still unique and worth the rather cheap price tag</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2169881"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2169881#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163235" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163235" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leppinen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492909.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leppinen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163235ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163235" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492909">Leppinen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-21">05/21/24 10:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was born in the 80's and even though I don't remember smelling any fragrances in my childhood, there's just something familiar to this and let's say Blue Jeans for example. They don't get good ratings in here but after smelling hundreds of different fragrances, I always go back to these cheapies from the 90's. They're the best. Everything older just smells like oakmoss and most of the newer ones lack soul.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2163235"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2163235#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163219" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153329" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rsnero680"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2024694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rsnero680" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153329ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153329" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); Smells really nice and is possibly my most versatile perfume. Despite being an EDT, on my skin it projects and lasts enough for winter use too. Very blind-buy safe, as I think it'd suit just about any man. Highly recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2153329"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2153329#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220383">Ozyman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 05:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What can i say?<br />
30 years have passed,<br />
But this thing is still one of the best fragrances in the world!<br />
Like Drakkar Noir, it was so good and so popular that even today you may buy shaving foam, or enter a shop uses fresh fragrance, that copy Eternity !<br />
Its for the night, for dating, or with family, or with friends, to make you feel high!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2137849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2137849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This would better suit a 40 year old lumberjack not me. I do appreciate the smell though. Like usual CK fragrances trash performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2132099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2132099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129020" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RobHillSF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2059045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2059045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RobHillSF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Encre-Noire-1834.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1834.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Encre Noire"title="Encre Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129020ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129020" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2059045">RobHillSF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 19:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the first guy i dated wore this during the height of the supermodel 90s, so there is no way for me to say anything about this fragrance other than that, for me, it still feels fresh &amp; exhilarating.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2129020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2129020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2116060" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LuckyStar1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2030.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LuckyStar1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Eau-de-Parfum-48100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"title="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2116060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2116060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2030">LuckyStar1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-06">04/06/24 06:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice clean fresh barber shop scent. I use this for casual days out, running errands and relaxing at home. Ideal for the Office too. I went through countless bottles of this when it was originally released and I always remember it lasted way more on the skin than it does now. Got a 100ml bottle for old times sake for under £30. A classic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2116060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2116060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113089" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="William C"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902606"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="William C" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902606">William C</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This eaue de toilette has an herbal and dark floral scent evoking an old-fahioned medicinal, almost goth vibe. Young guys may find it too much of a "gradpa" scent, as its heyday was the 80s and 90s, but for men who don't mind projecting traditional and mature masculinity, this product works fine. I keep a small bottle in my gym bag because it is appropriate for work, socializing, or whatever I might do after exercising. It's not an exciting scent, but women have complimented it on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2113089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2113089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2099271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
