padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1923250">LePianoMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-10">03/10/24 21:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Longevity isn’t great but for most of the lifetime of this perfume I get sweet, kind of green apple notes, mixed with some light citrus and slickness, and actually this is pretty cardamom-forward to me. Considering how popular cardamom is as a note, I’m surprised this isn’t more popular right now. I know it’s not listed as a note here but I swear this has the same sort of fresh cardamom vibe to it that LNDL has, but a little more aromatic and I didn’t get that apple nuance or the spice from LNDL.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084722" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OrangeGuy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OrangeGuy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Ombre-Noire-48063.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48063.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombre Noire"title="Ombre Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084722ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084722" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952223">OrangeGuy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 21:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells really good and clean. Everything in this fragrance just goes so well with eachother. Not offensive and very very VERY mass appealing. <br />
<br />
Only problem that i have with this fragrance and other CK fragrances as well, is the longevity and performance, IT'S really bad.<br />
<br />
Smell - 8.5/10<br />
Performance - 3/10<br />
Longevity - 4/10<br />
<br />
Suggestion: Only wear this in summer or spring</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2084722"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2084722#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2083447" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2083447" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iblamesaud"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044119"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2044119.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iblamesaud" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Opium-Eau-de-Parfum-2009-7399.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7399.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opium Eau de Parfum 2009"title="Opium Eau de Parfum 2009"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2083447ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2083447" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044119">iblamesaud</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-05">03/05/24 16:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A classic, fresh, clean fragrance for a great price. For me It smells like a barbershop but in a good way, and  nostalgic.  The performance is ok. It isn't too bad, but it isn't great either.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2083447"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2083447#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1959200">Kccryll</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-17">01/17/24 00:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance was my first love and started me down an incredibly expensive path.<br />
Opening of citrus and herbs that dries down into a pleasing woody, musky, masculine scent.  <br />
It’s a bit dated now, but that 80s/90s nostalgia is strong.  I always recommend this scent to people interested in getting into fragrances due to the price point and general versatility.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2033319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2033319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2026388" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you want a memorable and unique scent at a good value, this is fantastic for that.<br />
<br />
Personally I would not blind buy because I didn't love the scent enough to merit me buying a large bottle (off the 2ml sample I got) but it's a good scent for sure, I don't think anyone can say it's poor, especially for the price point</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2026388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2026388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020802" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Antoshka2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Antoshka2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Shaghaf-Oud-50582.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50582.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shaghaf Oud"title="Shaghaf Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660">Antoshka2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 23:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have always found it to be quite old fashioned but I don’t dislike it. It’s supposed to be a classic but nobody ever recognises it and people are always enquiring  what it is if they mention it. Because it’s old fashioned it’s quite formal when used sparingly and in moderation. A few extra sprays though and you’ll stand out in a crowd. Probably not to younger peoples tastes. I know I had no appreciation for it at all as a child when it was everywhere, but I definitely like it as an adult. Great value for money now it’s not the height of popularity too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="2020802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=2020802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996739" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bangster1234"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1739099.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bangster1234" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739099">bangster1234</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>By no means (is certainly not) this is a garbage pick. It is of great value, for 20 to 30 dollars and even cheaper prices in discount bins in stores, you can get yourself an everyday fragrance you can wear anytime of the day, though most recommended in the afternoon as it gives this Spring Season vibes that gives people the smell of nostalgia and happy memories. Real stuff in coming; Though the longevity is about 3 hours, the projection surprisingly is decent, about 2 feet of projection. People do make the mistake of forgetting to spray in your chest or in the collar of your shirt (in which are crucial placements for your fragrances' smell to strike people's faces) And since I did that, wow did it impress my Uncle whom of which has worn this in my earlier years of life (around 10 years old, I am now 18) when he did not have his baby yet. And as the name suggests, the fragrance is indeed a timeless masterpiece. Now buy it. Cheap, Classic, Nostalgic, and Beautiful to the nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1996739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1996739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1992908" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colognefreak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="colognefreak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mercedes-Benz/Mercedes-Benz-Sign-Your-Attitude-75488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mercedes-Benz Sign Your Attitude"title="Mercedes-Benz Sign Your Attitude"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1992908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1992908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235409">colognefreak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-05">12/05/23 04:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Putting aside the vilification of the naysayers, it’s just a pleasant, citrusy and unobtrusive summer freshie. It has a short life so you can wear it for shorter runs and apply something else later.<br />
Take it or leave it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1992908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1992908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983322" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="540"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902585"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="540" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983322ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983322" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902585">540</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 06:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>BARF! This hideous scent was everywhere in the early 90's. It was absolutely hateful. <br />
A cheap American fragrance for the masses.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1983322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1983322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1967586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1967586" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trueblood84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1439791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trueblood84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Parfum-81508.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81508.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Giò Parfum"title="Acqua di Giò Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1967586ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1967586" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439791">Trueblood84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-03">11/03/23 06:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternity used to be my secret weapon in the early 90s, everyone was wearing Drakkar Noir, Cool Water, or Tommy at the time, when one day I was shopping and the lady said well your very well dressed and seem mature for your age( I was 17), why don't you try this? As she handed me a tester of eternity. It was love at first sniff. The smell was sharp yet pleasant, herbaceous and green, it was nothing like any of my friends were wearing and I loved it for that. I wore it as a signature for 4 years, until the original Acqua di gio blew my mind... It always got me compliments, I'll always remember my highschool crush saying to her friend that I was the best smelling guy in school. Which was the moment that fragrance became an obsession for me. <br />
Fast forward 17 years and I am revisiting this classic which seldom gets attention these days, to see if the current formula is worth owning. I will edit this after a few wearings to get my exact opinion, as I don't want to do a disservice to this classic.<br />
<br />
Edit: At first sniff I immediately was disappointed but at the same time intrigued. This is definitely nowhere near the 90s formulation, but I actually enjoy the modern formula too. What I miss was the powerful rosewood note, it gave the fragrance that it factor. Second thing I noticed is that this is a much lighter, soapier fragrance. What I like is that with the rosewood turned down a notch I can pick up the other subtle nuances of the fragrance. As it dries down the DNA that I missed started to peek it's head out a bit more and now I'm quite pleased with what I'm left with. Even 33 years later, this stuff still smells great on me not to mention the kick of nostalgia I get from it. Overall for the price this is 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1967586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1967586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1965515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954453" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sajnog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1732264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sajnog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954453ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954453" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1732264">Sajnog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was in search for eternity cologne 2020 but ran into this.  Tested it on skin and it was the most offensive smell to me to date in my frag journey.  Dry heaves and coughing. Yuck.  I can't even describe it.  Maybe I shouldn't try the cologne lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1954453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1954453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1950412" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="u5987514"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="u5987514" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-for-Men-2056.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2056.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One for Men"title="The One for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1950412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1950412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859068">u5987514</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-12">10/12/23 17:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An affordable fragrance suitable for everyday wear in the warmer months, though I prefer to wear something a bit lighter in the middle of summer. I can see this becoming a go-to for office-wear. It's pleasant, unobtrusive and mature enough for a work environment. <br />
<br />
The scent is slightly old-fashioned though I don't think that works against it (it's just a matter of taste). <br />
<br />
I was actually not fond of this on a sample strip as the opening lavender note is quite strong and not to my taste, but this develops into a fragrance that I really enjoy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1950412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1950412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927699" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jackchemin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703106"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jackchemin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); The recent formulations don’t seem to have that note and if they do it’s very very weak. Loving it now it’s very refreshing and uplifting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1927699"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1927699#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1922597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Like going to the gym, sweaty then taking a shower. Then you just want to lie down in your room with the AC on and watch TV. Perfect for Mental Health Day Off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1920823"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1920823#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918948" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918948" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Louie_098"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Louie_098" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918948ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918948" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447805">Louie_098</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-03">09/03/23 14:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I may not have been born when this fragrance first launched, but I can confidently say it's a lifelong keeper for me! If I have a son one day, I'll definitely pass it down to him. This scent is a masterful blend of green, fresh, and clean notes that never go out of style. It's a foolproof choice for those days when you're unsure what to wear or want a reliable, affordable option that won't break the bank.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1918948"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1918948#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1914480" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1914480" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jaime N"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jaime N" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Egoiste-Platinum-614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Egoiste Platinum"title="Egoiste Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1914480ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1914480" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818218">Jaime N</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-29">08/29/23 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Snobs don't like the CK name. Out of the signature scents I've had in the last 25 years, this has been the one that survived the longest. It's a green, slightly flowery, fresh aromatic fougere. It has a slight sweetness to it but in a very botanical, airy way. The keys notes here for me are the lavender, the sage and the sandalwood, in a particularly well executed blend that gives a very clean, breezy yet creamy, natural character to the scent. Masculine, but inoffensive, and extremely versatile. I'd put this in the same category as Chanel's Platinum Egoiste, both great 90's allrounders that still feel modern. But while Platinum Egoiste feels more sophisticated and classy, Eternity feels safer and more casual. And since Eternity no longer enjoys the popularity of past years, you won't be smelling like a million guys out there, which is always a plus. Too underrated.<br />
Decent longevity and projection, even from the newer batches I tried.<br />
<br />
7.75/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1914480"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1914480#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Arguably the best that Calvin Klein has ever done. <br />
A throwback to the 1990s<br />
Still has a youthful and fresh scent. <br />
Long lasting and great for the summer.<br />
<br />
Rating: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1900524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1900524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1899665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1899665" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mc1995"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1146574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1146574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mc1995" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1899665ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1899665" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1146574">Mc1995</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-11">08/11/23 11:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not my favorite and I never reach for it but I don’t deny it’s timeless and a classic. I don’t usually go for freshie scents (Love CK Obsession) any age could wear this, 17 or 70</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1899665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1899665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1894947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1894947" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Will in DC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Will in DC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Legend-Eau-de-Parfum-62583.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62583.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legend Eau de Parfum"title="Legend Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1894947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1894947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687914">Will in DC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-05">08/05/23 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Some of these reviews are, to be charitable, questionable. This was not "inspired by" Platinum Egoiste, it came out 3 years before PE. We should ban the word "barbershop", it's lost any ability to convey  meaning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1894947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1894947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1890745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1890745" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="parfumapprentice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="parfumapprentice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1890745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1890745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689017">parfumapprentice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-30">07/30/23 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Morning scent for me. It’s a classic scent. Masculine herbal freshie, barbershop adjacent. Feels dated and archetypal in the fougere class. Low quality ingredients and formulation but about what you’d expect for the price. Harsh citrusy sagey lavender leads the way. Dry down is sweet and woody. <br />
<br />
Older formulations are much better, fuller-bodied. I’d say it’s worth finding an older bottle that’s been properly maintained just to smell what this is meant to be, because the vintage scent is iconic.<br />
<br />
No matter how much you spray the current formulation, it just doesn’t come close to what it used to be. More synthetic and thinner (in a bad way) than before, seems diluted, almost like someone cut it with water. This juice is dirt cheap, CK I’m sure gets great margins on this. You’ll need the extra sprays if you want performance.<br />
<br />
Unless you absolutely douse yourself and clothes in this stuff, it becomes a skin scent after 2.5 hours which honestly is fine! Put on something different or re-apply, it’s cheap. I get the platinum egoiste x fierce comparison, especially in the dry down. Those are different but related scents, and the newest formulations of those trump this. <br />
<br />
This is for a young, masculine man with simple, non-pretentious, non-fussy taste, but likes to smell good. Good “I don’t care what happens to it” scent for the gym bag also.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1890745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1890745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1885885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1885885" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michael_Noir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1741655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1741655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michael_Noir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1885885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1885885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1741655">Michael_Noir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-24">07/24/23 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Calvin Klein's version of Egoiste Platinum, class in a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1885680" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="timmybils"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773009"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1773009.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="timmybils" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/Squidward-28290.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28290.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Squidward"title="Squidward"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1885680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1885680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1885680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1885680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1874016" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ashroloie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ashroloie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Voyage-Bleu-47791.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47791.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Voyage Bleu"title="Voyage Bleu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1874016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1874016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735186">ashroloie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-08">07/08/23 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Iconic casual mens summer scent. Will most definitely get around to buying another bottle of this sometime. You couldn't go wrong wearing this. Nobody would not like it. Not groundbreaking by today's standards but will always be a classic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1874016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1874016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1873266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1873266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Apotheosis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Apotheosis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1873266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1873266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782562">Apotheosis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-07">07/07/23 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fragrance draped in the grandeur of an Aromatic Fougere symphony. Unveiled to the world in the glorious year of 1990, this olfactory marvel continues to reign supreme.<br />
<br />
Within its scented fortress, the notes that truly captivate my discerning senses are none other than the sage, basil, vetiver, and lavender. Oh, what a divine quartet they form, dancing harmoniously upon the tapestry of masculinity! It is these very ingredients that have immortalised Eternity For Men, ensuring its relentless presence in the market for over three glorious decades. One cannot deny its exalted status as a timeless classic.<br />
<br />
Verily, Eternity For Men by Calvin Klein stands as a testament to timeless excellence, an aromatic journey that bewitches the soul. Though my personal fragrance voyage may have diverted paths, I raise my scented glass in tribute to this remarkable creation, forever a beacon of olfactory magnificence. Bravo Carlos Benaim thrice bravo!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1873266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1873266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1857777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1857777" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Freakmoney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663619"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Freakmoney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1857777ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1857777" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663619">Freakmoney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-16">06/16/23 10:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A relatively straightforward scent that is clean and inoffensive. The only downside is it smells slightly synthetic but it was my first love cologne that got me into the hobby. A good fresh fragrance for a young man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1857777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1857777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853075" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jcarolinajr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329594.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="jcarolinajr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Pi-39.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pi"title="Pi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853075ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853075" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329594">jcarolinajr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-09">06/09/23 22:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I believe in eternity and as such, I also believe in wearing the fragrance Eternity! I save it to wear when my spirit feels eternal, and it never fails to bring down the curtain and the entire house with it. Therefore, when I’m feeling my usual introvert personality I don’t wear it. I only wear it to inspire others to “believe”!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1853075"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1853075#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849692" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1849692" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scenturian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/12211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.12211.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="scenturian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coromandel-Eau-de-Parfum-41783.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41783.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coromandel Eau de Parfum"title="Coromandel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1849692ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1849692" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1849692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1849692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1849689" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blood_and_wine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506860.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="blood_and_wine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1849689ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1849689" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506860">blood_and_wine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-05">06/05/23 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love the scent. I got 5 1.2ml CK testers and decided to get a bottle of Eternity EDT because it was awesome. I was smelling this one on myself for at the very least 3 hours, it was projecting quite heavily for about that long. it's actually a little bit too strong (I'm not complaining).<br />
The opening is not amazing (as for virtually everything else), after like 3 minutes the harshness goes away.<br />
<br />
Disclaimer: Eternity EDP almost made me puke. The EDT is infinitely better and sexier. Don't even think about getting the EDP version, stick with the cheaper and better option aka this one.<br />
<br />
I have to say it's a nice change from the sweet summer frags like Legend Spirit. What I like about this one in particular is that it's not soapy at all, unlike Azzaro Chrome and Nautica Voyage.<br />
The bottle is ok. Feels a little bit cheap though because of the thin glass and being lightweight but at least it looks classy and respectable.<br />
I don't really care if it's old, it smells great and that's what matters.<br />
<br />
8.5/10 Awesome</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1849689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1849689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1846561" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I've had a bottle for almost ten years and it still smells the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1845948"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1845948#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1838537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1838537" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Margeti79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620843"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1620843.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Margeti79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1838537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1838537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620843">Margeti79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-21">05/21/23 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At the moment it’s finally sunny spring day, I’m at the terrace, in background I can hear Duran Duran’s album “Notorious” ( song “Matter of feeling”,1986) playing from my vintage Technics turntable (1979), few sprays of Eternity on me and the life is perfect. So perfect that I have to write something just to have it like a proof..<br />
<br />
After years of rocking heavy vintage 70’s i 80’s classics in last few months I suddenly crave for 90’s classics, especially Paco Rabanne XS(1994), Versace Dreamer and Dolce Gabbana pour homme. Eternity and PR XS have that similar vibe that gives me joy at the moment. Just few years ago I hated Eternity and now, pooof, it’s perfect!!?!<br />
<br />
I own a new version and I find it very good! Few months ago I tried a perfume version and didn’t like it! EDT is a winner again!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1838537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1838537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1837411" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
