padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747931">Jose Zerpa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-19">05/19/23 21:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it smells like the typical 90's douchebag wearing Timberlands and an Aeropostale t-shirts. The smell is way too pungent and it gave me a headache within and hour of spraying it on my skin. retails on Canadian stores at $130+GST, which is IMO unjustifiable by all means. This fragrance is WAY too outdated and atrocious to modern standards. Even if you want to re-purchase out of nostalgia, Id recommend to try it on your skin before you buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1837411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1837411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1834069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1834069" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cholera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1747706.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cholera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1834069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1834069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747706">Cholera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-15">05/15/23 21:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Classic green, herbaceous, floral and clean scent, not that dated or unique but I like it, it smells like soapy aftershave, kinda reminds me of chanel platinum egoiste but a lot sweeter and a little less mature. It is like if platinum egoiste and A&amp;F fierce had a baby. Overall, it is a fresh, inoffensive cheapie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1834069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1834069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1832826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1832826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1832826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1832826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-14">05/14/23 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#45 in my planned tour of 250 fragrances in 250 days. At @100 a bottle there are better options for the money IMO. Honestly, I've always considered Calvin Klein's stuff at the upper end of drugstore fragrances, probably because they marketed them all in combo gift boxes for Christmas, so every man I knew in the 90's was getting Calvin Klein in his stocking. We've smelled this one in every elevator for the last 30 years, so if you want to stand out and draw attention, pass it by. Initial opening hits like a blast of lavender baby powder, though after a while the other components come through. There's nothing here that isn't likable. Not a loud fragrance, but not stealth. After a two hours it's barely a skin scent on me, gone completely in five, but I get that with EDTs a lot, which is why I have seldom bought them and why I won't be buying this one again. But at some point in my "Tour de Fragrance" I may check out the EDP and Parfum versions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1832826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1832826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1830425" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1830425" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StankFrank"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1338100.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="StankFrank" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Shams-Oud-12139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shams Oud"title="Shams Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1830425ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1830425" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338100">StankFrank</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-11">05/11/23 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Old Spice Steel Titan deodorant &amp; ain't nothing wrong with that!<br />
<br />
Cheap classic. I have bottles from 2018, I wonder how the newest formulation smells with the recent banning of Lillal. Use like an EDC - spray liberally on skin &amp; don't expect more than 3-4 hours. Chicks dig it. Green freshie. Try the aftershave balm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1830425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1830425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1822092" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michel Silencieux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564098"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1564098.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michel Silencieux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Brit-Rhythm-18903.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18903.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Brit Rhythm"title="Burberry Brit Rhythm"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1822092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1822092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564098">Michel Silencieux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-01">05/01/23 05:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There’s a reason that this is still being sold more than 30 years after it was released: It’s damn good! I used to wear this quite a bit in the 90s, and my last bottle ran out this week. Even though it’s good stuff, I’ve decided to part ways with Eternity EDT and won’t be re-buying it. <br />
<br />
Clean, fresh and respectable. Longevity is poor though, but if you purchase this on discount, you can’t go wrong with Eternity. I’ve got some of its flankers in my collection to get through and feel this one is no longer right for me, but it might be right for you though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1822092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1822092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820237" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daviako"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1283300.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daviako" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Giò Profondo"title="Acqua di Giò Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820237ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820237" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283300">Daviako</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 15:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'll be honest, I didn't purchase this fragrance. My friend bought another cologne a while back and the salesperson just threw in an entire plastic-wrapped pack of Eternity decants. He didn't want them, so he gave them to me. Pulled one out today to wear around the house, and never realized how inoffensively nice this is. <br />
<br />
I have heard/seen the Eternity ads but was curious as to how long it's been around. Initially, I had guessed the early-mid 2000s. Usually when a fragrance is older than that, there are so many notes that it either becomes overwhelming, or confusing. Imagine my shock when I discovered that it came out in 1990...this is probably one of the oldest, yet most modern-smelling fragrances I've encountered. <br />
<br />
As far as longevity and projection go, good luck. When I sprayed it, I couldn't smell anything two hours later. However, while I could smell it, all the notes worked harmoniously to balance each other, creating this fresh, clean smell that anyone would be hard-pressed to find offensive. Thus, the name Eternity is apt, as it should remain appealing for that long, even if its longevity doesn't.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1820237"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1820237#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1812687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Somewhat dated. Something about it reminds me of Dylan Blue...meh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1812687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1812687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1809149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1809149" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maki_minga"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="maki_minga" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alfred-Dunhill/Icon-Elite-38982.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38982.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Icon Elite"title="Icon Elite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1809149ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1809149" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183379">maki_minga</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-14">04/14/23 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very floral, very persistent, clean and durable. I just cannot think of a reason not to like it. Works for me as a quick fix when having no idea what to refresh myself with or with a straightforward intention: today I feel like wearing it. Seems to me more of a daily, if not only a morning scent. Thumbs up for this fougere classic ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1809149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1809149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1800771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1800771" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JosueAli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JosueAli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1800771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1800771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676361">JosueAli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-04">04/04/23 20:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fragrance that everyone's dad probably has/had. I wore it a few times after I found it in my dad's room and I can see why it is a classic. My favorite part of the fragrance would have to be the dry down. Lasts around 4-6 hours, definitely not a bad price either, Reminds me of a barbershop smell like many other people said, would recommend picking up for the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1800771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1800771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1795051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1795051" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FloridaFragLover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1519124"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1519124.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FloridaFragLover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1795051ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1795051" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1519124">FloridaFragLover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-28">03/28/23 17:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There's many testers of this fragrance I've come across lately that all smell spoiled. Is it that Calvin Klein has an abundance of overstock and has been offloading them semi expired? I know what spoiled in fragrances smells like and this is it. Smells nothing at all like it did back then and I mean nothing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1795051"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1795051#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1792254" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1792254" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249347"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249347.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jacques-Fath/Encens-Copal-90771.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90771.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Encens Copal"title="Encens Copal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1792254ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1792254" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249347">Chesco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-25">03/25/23 07:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aquatic + Cardamom + Spicy Ginger + spicy Coriander +  Lemon + aromatic Sage + Basil + touch of Lavender + Pine Needle or Cypress + Carnation floral + Geranium Floral + Javanol (synthetic Sandalwood) + Musk + touch of warm Amber<br />
<br />
Inspired by Chanel ‘Egoiste’, and in the same mid 90’s scent genre as Hugo ‘Green’.  This one is a thinner more youthful elegant juice compared to the others mentioned.<br />
<br />
A dna trend for it’s time, supported with an extremely aggressive marketing.  Hard to go anywhere in public or on your TV without seeing an ad.  Smells like magazines as they use to include a pull-tab or scratch n sniff tab within them to educate the public that the perfume existed.<br />
Students would get a bottle for Christmas and the one guy in the gym locker-room would get asked by everyone to get a spray (or rudely multiple) so they can attract their crush at the next class.<br />
<br />
It’s now a classic forgotten scent genre.  My favorite was Hugo ‘Green’ which i cherished.  But this genre is too strong for close encounters.  Its a wear in public fragrance.<br />
Still wearable tbh, just not trendy and is dated.  Great for Spring season.<br />
I recommend a modern take on the scent genre, TF Bois Moracain  as an updated modern scent with added Oud, Palo Santo wood, and Incense.<br />
<br />
3.5/5 Woofs!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1792254"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1792254#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1788403" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539321">Wichiteka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-24">02/24/23 22:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore this in the 90's until it just didn't smell the same and didn't lasted as long, little did I know about reformulations back then.<br />
I just purchased a 100ml bottle by mistake, I thought I was purchasing the edp.<br />
<br />
that first spray took me back to 1992, those hot summer nights, so many memories. I'm keeping this one for nostalgic purposes.<br />
<br />
Little did I realize that this perfume along with CK Obsession set my tastes for life. in the case of Eternity edt, that lavender, those floral notes, just has me searching for similar notes, the first time I smelled Versace The Dreamer I was hooked, The first time I smelled Acque di Parma Colonia Essenza I fell in love. Not that they smell the same, but the floral notes, although different, still floral, but masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1768705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1768705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1764072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1764072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coola265"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1636391"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1636391.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coola265" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1764072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1764072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1636391">Coola265</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-19">02/19/23 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first I didnt really like this scent, However I didnt actually spray it on my skin at first, I used a test strip. Months later I purchased another frag and was given a 10ml decant as a sample, Its almost the end of winter, and Im getting a bit sick and tired of the sweet scents. I tried this on 2-3 weeks ago, And im absolutely in love with this clean, fresh smelling scent. Its very pleasant and definetly reminds me of a barber shop. I absolutely cant wait to buy a bottle of this. And I absolutely cant wait for spring to get here so I can really rock this. <br />
Please stop listening to the opinions of fragrance snobs that frequent the website. Try this stuff for yourself if you havent already. Its very affordable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1764072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1764072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1763549" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1763549" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noseblinded"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noseblinded" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1763549ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1763549" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408714">Noseblinded</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-18">02/18/23 21:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You could talk about its clean vibes. I'd say its part gel, part aftershave, part something green that vagely reminds me of GIT.<br />
<br />
You could talk about how, for the price this smells decent.<br />
<br />
You could talk about how you're better off getting Platinum Egoiste.<br />
<br />
But what really needs to be talked about is Calvin Klein's bravery. I could only wish to one day have as much confidence in myself as CK has in this fragrance, because they took a fragrance that on well hydrated skin lasts a maximum of 3 hours... and named it Eternity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; small bottle from long ago.  This is a classic scent, just all around very pleasant and approachable. Some sweet notes, maybe vanilla, somewhat fruity with low spice. Didn't overpower but kept fairly close to the skin throughout the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1753591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1753591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1739688" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1739688" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kuldeep S"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161095"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1161095.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kuldeep S" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Ombre-Leather-Parfum-68716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombré Leather Parfum"title="Ombré Leather Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1739688ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1739688" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161095">Kuldeep S</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-21">01/21/23 08:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fresh, little spicy. It smells modern . It does not seems to be related to 90's. Now there are many fragrance that may smell like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1739688"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1739688#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1739204" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1739204" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="websterdaniel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/859802"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.859802.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="websterdaniel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cerruti/Image-332.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.332.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Image"title="Image"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1739204ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1739204" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/859802">websterdaniel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-20">01/20/23 16:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After all these years, I still find this such a comforting scent. The fragrance itself, is a timeless classic. However, it's also incontrovertible evidence of how perfumery is done right, and then reformulated to screw it all up! Somewhat different from years ago, but still good enough to wear. I suggest seeking out vintage bottles. Still great stuff!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1739204"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1739204#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1736828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1736828" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TinDines"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664406"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1664406.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TinDines" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Angel-Schlesser/Aromatic-Sage-91900.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91900.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aromatic Sage"title="Aromatic Sage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1736828ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1736828" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664406">TinDines</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-17">01/17/23 22:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>ETERNITY<br />
Convertido en un icono de las fragancias de calidad. Con una composición compleja y elegante, cuyas notas que más destacan son claramente hervales.<br />
Te transporta a un bosque frondoso tras la lluvia.<br />
Un básico todoterreno que va ha oler bien incluso en ocasiones comprometidas.<br />
Tiene un aroma lineal sin cambios, desde su salida hasta su fondo. Prácticamente parece que todas sus notas vibren al unísono con acordes de calidad, finos y nobles.<br />
Un paso intermedio entre los perfumes fuertes y dulzones de los 80 y los florales y afrutados de hoy en día sin recurrir a notas acuáticas.<br />
 Le puedes sacar un gran partido por su gran cantidad de notas dependiendo del modo en que te perfumes. Incluso potencia otros perfumes si realizas mezclas y combinaciones.<br />
Sus 33 años en el mercado dicen el resto para este perfume que sólo hay que olerlo para comprenderlo. Aunque siempre habrá el cavernícola que le parecerá agua con limón al que le ha caído un trozo de ambientador de pino.😁</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1736828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1736828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1735076" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Reminds me when i was study in university.<br />
7.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1735076"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1735076#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1717662" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hari2023"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1641035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1641035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hari2023" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1717662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1717662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1641035">Hari2023</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-26">12/26/22 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>CK Eternity and Obsession were the only two fragrances that I knew of when I started wearing fragrance 25+ years ago. Mysteriously, I had not owned either one of them in the last 10 years. However, I received a gift of Obsession two years ago, and I laughed at Obsession when I opened the gift box. It was the feeling of a reunion with your best friend, a great long-term companion and a mature character. It brought back the past memories and reinvigorated my "forgotten" obsession for Obsession. I then ended up buying Eternity because I missed the other half of the story. Time does change but certain things do not. CK Eternity and Obsession are two holy grail of fragrance. They rejuvenate you, grow with you and become a part of you. I have worn over 50 fragrances in the last 25 years, however, CK Eternity and Obsession are very personal to me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1717662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1717662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1707734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1707734" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kustomeyez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1528791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kustomeyez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Elixir-71708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Elixir"title="1 Million Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1707734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1707734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791">Kustomeyez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-12">12/12/22 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me myself and my nose, I find this to fall somewhere in the middle between creed green Irish tweed and creed Himalaya . I haven’t smelled this eternity in decades,…just picked up a bottle today,,  and instantly at first smelled familiar to the likings of the creed DNA once I smelled this again 25+ years since I had last smelled this.  Good stuff, glad I picked this up .(again)   Can’t speak on longevity. , but I’ve been catching wiffs of the projection for last couple of hrs without directly sniffing my skin.  .  I give this 5/5 for nostalgia and 5/5 for scent.  If I like it personally, it automatically gets a 5/5 . Fragrances are open to opinion. &amp; my opinion is this is still good stuff ., unlike azaro pour homme .  Ufff that one is just ufffff !!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1707734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1707734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1699759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1699759" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afc_Croatian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afc_Croatian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1699759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1699759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156">Afc_Croatian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-01">12/01/22 06:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Even 32 years later, this can be worn today.<br />
<br />
My dad wore this a lot growing up. it gives off such a pleasant relaxing vibe. To me, Calvin Klein always tried making fragrances that are easy-wearing and appeal to the masses, CK Eternity is different enough from their line and has its own personality to be worthy of owning a bottle in your collection. <br />
<br />
The vibe I would say it has is "middle-aged man who just finished using every fresh shower gel scent he can find". It's very fresh, clean and welcoming. While it leans towards an older audience, I think you can get away with wearing this in your 20's as well :)<br />
<br />
8/10 for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1699759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1699759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697981" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1697981" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CkEeternity Lover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1619330.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CkEeternity Lover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1697981ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1697981" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619330">CkEeternity Lover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-28">11/28/22 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this fragrance, i remember when i went to chemist warehouse and asked if i could smell it. For some reason i got the dirtiest look from the worker and they said i quote "Are you serious, do you actually want to fucking smell this shit." I said yes ofc i do! I remember the worker pinching his nose, while he sprayed it onto the test strip. As soon as i smelt it i snatched it out of his hand and sprayed all over me. "I LOVE THIS" i screamed and ran to counter with the biggest smile on my face and payed for it. I am still yet to smell a better fragrance at 75 years old, this fragrance is gonna get buried with me and poured all over my coffin. I also named my dog Eternity after this amazing scent 10/10 would highly recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1697981"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1697981#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1692681" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1692681" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/298932"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nautica/Nautica-2479.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2479.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nautica"title="Nautica"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1692681ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1692681" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/298932">cell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-20">11/20/22 15:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find it funny that people put datestamps on fragrances. By that logic, Sauvage, BDC and a slew of blue frags will be grandpa colognes in the future too! I grew up in the 90's and I love Eternity. Heck, I even rocked Jovan Musk and got compliments. It's 2022 and I still wear Eternity as much as my BDC. If I wear CK One now I may get raised eyebrows for wearing a youthful scent. To be honest, it's a bit sad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1692681"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1692681#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1684759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1684759" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kvo5"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1590816"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1590816.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kvo5" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1684759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1684759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1590816">kvo5</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-09">11/09/22 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my absolute favourite men’s fragrance in the 90’s. Head turner, heart melter. I haven’t smelled it in so many years, I wonder if I would still love it today…</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1684759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1684759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1681376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1681376" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Catsylvania"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1199216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Catsylvania" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Poivre-Noir-75836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poivre Noir"title="Poivre Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1681376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1681376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199216">Catsylvania</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-05">11/05/22 03:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Somehow, I've ended up with a handful of samples of Eternity and decided to give it a nice test run with an open mind. Upon opening, I honestly didn't feel the geranium and musk. Combined with the lavender, vetiver and sage, the mix instantly gave off aftershave vibes. Luckily for me, the mandarin managed to round off the remainder of the citruses so there was no issue on that front. <br />
<br />
I did get an odd little bit of spiciness every now and then but the longer I wore the scent (without reapplication), the better it got. The mix ended up this refreshing, cooling bouquet of green notes so seamlessly blended, I honestly had no desire to nitpick. The silage was a bit of a dud because the scent ended up sitting skin-tight but in terms of longevity, you'll get a lot of bang for your buck. <br />
<br />
I would say, if you ever want to resort to something out of the "classics" category when it's summer and you want something to give you a bit of fresh air, Eternity is worth checking out. I would even suggest hunting down a good vintage bottle if you want an even smoother sailing. Wonderful, wonderful scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1681376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1681376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1678394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1678394" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ceazer77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1365780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1365780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ceazer77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/Turathi-Blue-70839.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70839.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Turathi Blue"title="Turathi Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1678394ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1678394" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1365780">Ceazer77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-01">11/01/22 00:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A masterpiece, fresh, aromatic and masculine fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1678394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1678394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1676805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1676805" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LMBelvi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LMBelvi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dame-Perfumery/Soliflore-Orange-Flower-39862.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39862.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soliflore Orange Flower"title="Soliflore Orange Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1676805ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1676805" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331454">LMBelvi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-29">10/29/22 10:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one surprised me pleasantly considering how cheap and readily available it is. I got a package of four minis and have worn this one and CK one which I thought I disliked but I was wrong. <br />
<br />
Eternity is a good wake up fragrance if your energy is lacking. Not very complex smelling for all the variety of notes in it but I can usually trust Carlos B to use his ingredients expertly. <br />
<br />
Now, is this a highly memorable or unique choice? No. It is safe and classy. I wear it happily as a female customer but it is solidly in traditional mens cologne territory to my nose. Hope that’s helpful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1676805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1676805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1670033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its not strong to the point you fill the room, but at a close distance its noticeable, I only put on 2 sprays and I'm good for the up until around 3pm (applied at 7:30). Strongly recommend this cologne, it doesn't fit in during winter though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1662723"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1662723#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
