Wears well all year round and out on a date. Not shy to say it’s an old classic my dad would have worn.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1660303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1660303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1657270" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NikosN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356678"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1356678.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NikosN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1657270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1657270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356678">NikosN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-02">10/02/22 04:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this one a lot. Sweet citrus, fresh,woody. You can't believe that this perfume was created in 1990. It's masculine and timeless. Not at all old school. Longevity and silage perfect for hot weather. Quite similar to Calvin Klein Eternity EDP. Still being preferred by the community. It's a proof that we like timeless classics. Age range from 20s and up.<br />
*EDIT*<br />
Gentlemen this came out BEFORE Chanel Platinum Egoiste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1657270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1657270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657163" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1534845">AmenFraggie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-20">09/20/22 22:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The absolute classic... I'd apparently started my journey into the frags world by this piece of vintage art... back in the early-mid 90's, when I was a 3-4 years old baby, I was totally drowned in that world of fragrances! (playing with them, spraying them, discovering them in my own way)... As they say, I used to go to get the key to my uncle's room who lived in the same family building with us, and then I would spend hours drowning in the colognes on the man's toilet table (as well as my parent's ones), LEADING BY CK ETERNITY &amp; of course some other best one such as ACQ, Clinique Happy and so on....He still reminds this fun story and says: "you yourself had ended up my beautiful Calvin Eternity!!" I absolutely love him and the beautiful delicious gorgeous-smelling Eternity by Calvin Klein !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1649489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1649489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1648945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; it simply has no character, too safe for my taste. <br />
personally I'd rather smell of nothing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1629089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1629089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1618455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1618455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alicen1derland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1245282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alicen1derland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Casablanca-42181.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42181.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Casablanca"title="Casablanca"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1618455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1618455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245282">Alicen1derland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-06">08/06/22 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this for my son and daughter to try out, and surprisingly, they both ended up enjoying it more than they expected. Initially, it had a strong and somewhat cheap scent to me, which some reviewers also noted as being metallic or plastic-like. However, that harshness fades quickly, leaving behind a pleasant fragrance after 15-30 minutes, especially if applied sparingly. It evokes a 90s vibe, which I find refreshing. My daughter, who usually prefers fresh cologne scents, grew to like it once it settled on her skin, despite her initial hesitation. My son also liked it but wasn't keen on getting a full-size bottle. Overall, it's a pleasant, masculine yet fresh scent, although we still prefer Eternity Aqua to this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1618455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1618455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1615298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1615298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IamdrinkingBeer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="IamdrinkingBeer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Atlas-Fever-57117.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57117.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Atlas Fever"title="Atlas Fever"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1615298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1615298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309936">IamdrinkingBeer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-02">08/02/22 05:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A great one. A clear fragrance that is a sign of its times, but why not? Why can't something wear the era it was created on its sleeves? This reminds me of green irish tweed, but more soft, airy and soapy. A fantastic daytime scent that you can not go wrong with.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1615298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1615298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1610819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1610819" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scottbarrett"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454250"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="scottbarrett" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1610819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1610819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454250">scottbarrett</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-26">07/26/22 07:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bagged a 50ml with a 100ml shower gel gift set for £40.<br />
A classic green/fougere/herbal type scent from the nineties.<br />
If you want to stand out from the crowd,with the relentless blue/aquatic scents designers are banging out these days have a go with this,you never know you might be quietly surprised.<br />
You can get a 100ml flacon on the high street for roughly £40 with the 15/20% discounts going on  so not bad value for money at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1610819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1610819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1600461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1600461" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skaccomatto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/209392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.209392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="skaccomatto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Eau-Givree-72439.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72439.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"title="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1600461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1600461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/209392">skaccomatto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-10">07/10/22 14:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to admit that Eternity has grown on me over the past few months; upon buying it, I was kinda repulsed by its sharp metallic and plasticky notes that reminded me a bit of Cool Water on steroids or similar fragrances in that style. I think I never smelled the original formulation so I can't really compare them, unlike I could with Cool Water, and maybe that helped me a bit in starting an appreciation journey for Eternity - I had no need to drown in nostalgia.<br />
<br />
The initial blast of strong synthetic lavender (probably lavandin) is the most difficult part to digest in this fragrance, as it gives off quite strong plasticky/metallic/play doh vibes that might put people (or my nose, at least) a bit off at first. The metallic side of it takes up the reins of '90s style fresh perfumery - Green Irish Tweed, Cool Water, a touch of Egoiste Platinum maybe - but dilutes it in a background of white florals that, after repeated use, becomes a distinct sweeter part of the opening and help tame it and it's actually quite pleasant. <br />
<br />
I'm still convinced that something green/aromatic as strong as coriander may not be the best companion for synthetic lavander/lavandin. Who knows, I'm not a perfumer! Anyway, after 5 to 10 minutes, the harshest facets of Eternity fade away and the scent looses intensity, becoming a nice, skin-anchored and soft, effusive aromatic-floral fragrance that to me is quite clearly masculine leaning, and somehow assertive. I think this would be a great gym scent, pairing nicely with mint-based shower gels, all year round, or a spring/summer cheapie for quick errands in a t-shirt and shorts, but I think it's metallic initial note, if lasted longer, would make it a good office scent as well. <br />
<br />
After barely two hours, the scent has literally gone, and the base never really shows up as a significant player; yeah there is some clean musk coming through, but I get literally zero woods. This must be the effect of endless reformulation and the reason for its cheap price. Actually I'm not bothered by its lack of performance - I can only imagine what would mean the plasticky note pumped up for longevity - and the price suggests liberal usage multiple times a day.<br />
<br />
Neutral ok on this one but I like it more than what my rating would suggest, and certainly better than Cool Water; for some reasons, though, I can't go up to a like. 90s bottle design didn't age too bad either, batch code for my 30ml bottle is 9304 from October 2019.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1600461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1600461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1585135" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490277">mentalplane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-15">06/15/22 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>During my youth, the first time a girl told me I smelled nice, I was wearing Eternity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1585135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1585135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1576947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1576947" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yessamin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/153205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.153205.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yessamin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tartine-et-Chocolat/Tartine-Chocolate-Ptimusc-85266.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85266.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tartine & Chocolate Ptimusc"title="Tartine & Chocolate Ptimusc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1576947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1576947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/153205">Yessamin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-03">06/03/22 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternally classic and distinctly masculine with crisp notes of mandarin, lavender and sandalwood.<br />
EdT, also available as aftershave.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1576947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1576947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1561911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1561911" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sul98tan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1501694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sul98tan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1561911ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1561911" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); Smells really old, a smell you would find at a barber shop. Don't recommend it , outdated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1561911"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1561911#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1559565" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1559565" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Professor Value"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171228"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171228.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Professor Value" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geoffrey-Beene/Grey-Flannel-4608.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4608.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grey Flannel"title="Grey Flannel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1559565ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1559565" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171228">Professor Value</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-08">05/08/22 05:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Solidly pleasant. This deserves a 4.0 rating, not in the 3.0's. Slightly green, slightly clean, and can be had at an amazingly low price point. It falls nicely within the barbershop category, and that most definitely is in my wheelhouse. While performance is only average, just bring a decant with you for refreshing. UPDATE: People, people! This is a solid scent, unique and very pleasant. The current version is good and inexpensive. FYI, I've got a partial bottle of the original 1989 release "Cologne Spray" on the way...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1559565"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1559565#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1559035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1559035" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="haazelnt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1499762.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="haazelnt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1559035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1559035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499762">haazelnt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-07">05/07/22 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this for my boyfriend but definitely want one for myself, it's an oldie but a goodie!<br />
I bought this as it has similar vibes as the bleu de Chanel. It has a strong citrus smell in the beginning but lingers into a jasmine musk. It's not a safe blind buy as it can be quite strong.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1559035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1559035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1554760" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BigBobRoss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1424815"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1424815.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BigBobRoss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Tobacolor-65551.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65551.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacolor"title="Tobacolor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1554760ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1554760" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1424815">BigBobRoss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-01">05/01/22 12:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dark woody orange with a citrus lemony twist, warm amber soothing winter fragrance. <br />
<br />
Kinda has a boozy edge to it, longevity and sillage it pretty poor 3 hours max <br />
<br />
Overall a decent old school fragrance, not bad for a cheapie</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1554760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1554760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1543753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259496">EauDeBaldy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-14">04/14/22 22:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was such a staple to CK before CKOne came along. This was masculinity &amp; class in a bottle.<br />
<br />
I'm revisiting this one for ol' times sake and it still has that class that never left.<br />
<br />
This is 1 of those, that is great when you first spray it and gets even better when it dries down.<br />
<br />
While this is old, this still stands on it's own.<br />
<br />
Excellent for all around but, I like it in the cooler times of Spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1543753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1543753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1542307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1542307" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OneGoodScent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OneGoodScent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Les-Sables-Roses-55040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Les Sables Roses"title="Les Sables Roses"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1542307ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1542307" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486126">OneGoodScent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-13">04/13/22 00:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to admit, this was literally the first scent I ever had. CK Eternity was gifted to me back in 1991 and I thought it was the shit! I also had a poster of JCVD spin kicking someone for the movie Bloodsport, wanted a lamborghini countach and Cindy Crawford was my dream girl. All things that should be left in the late 80's / early 90's. CK Eternity should be left in the 90's. It's nostalgia for me at this point, but so is "new coke" or "crystal pepsi". Thank you for your services CK Eternity, but it's time to retire old friend. You've done a great job and now you can look forward to gardening, senior specials and NB 530's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1542307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1542307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1540342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1540342" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gmess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252772"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gmess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1540342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1540342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252772">Gmess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-09">04/09/22 18:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Besides this being a great fragrance, CK Eternity has so many nostalgic aspects for me. This is THE fragrance that initiated my love and obsession for fragrances. It is also the fragrance I was wearing in very significant moments of my life (when I met and starting dating my wife, wedding day, and the birth of my first born) just to name a few.<br />
<br />
Anyway to the scent. This to me is green, woody and very spicy. It does start out slightly citrusy, but the greenness of the basil and eventually the vetiver stands out way more IMO. It’s pretty linear, what you get in the beginning is what you get at the end. I would say the performance of the current formulation is slightly worse than the original, but not much. It still retains the original smell and performance pretty well. This fragrance gets overlooked these days but it was very popular when it came out in 1990. It’s a classic fougere but it does not smell as dated as some other classics. I will always have this in my collection, yes for nostalgic reasons but also cuz it’s really good!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1540342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1540342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1534059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1528837" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellyDog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399965"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellyDog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1528837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1528837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399965">SmellyDog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-23">03/23/22 07:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Was gifted this and it is beautiful for a classic. Price per ml makes it unworrisome and I can spray as much as I want with my only worry being fogging others out with the fragrance. <br />
<br />
I smelled this on someone else, and it was like an entirely different fragrance. I assume the reformulation the latest comments mention are the reason for this. But he smelled damn good. Though I go noseblind to this particular fragrance very quickly and can only smell it upclose on my skin. i didn't realise I smelled that way at all and it has renewed my appreciation for this fragrance tenfold. My only other thought is that his bottle was an older mix where as mine was purchased in 2021. So may have fallen victim to the change.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1528837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1528837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I had a bottle 2 years ago (2019-2020) and it was my favorite scent i wore it every day. The juice in the bottle from 2021 has no citrus in the opening is sticky sweet, and has nothing to lift it up. Something is way off with it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1525676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1525676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1523104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1523104" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Caveman Sam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439504"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Caveman Sam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1523104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1523104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439504">Caveman Sam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-14">03/14/22 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Recently reformulated?  I got a decanted sample and thought it smelled amazing.  A clean 90s blend of herbal freshness with just enough complexity.<br />
<br />
  Bought a full size from a well-known online seller and it smells completely different, and much for the worse.  <br />
<br />
Screechy faux-citrus top that smells exactly like OFF!  Mosquito Repellant, on top of a watered down base akin to A&amp;F Fierce. It's awful and industrially-synthetic, with zero complexity.    The batch code (1067) comes back as manufactured on March 2021.<br />
<br />
Extremely disappointed and now wary of all the CKs I've recently seen on sale both online and in-store.  Also tempted to email to decanter to ask for the date on the sample I got.  It was so, soo much better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1523104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1523104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1516894" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1516894" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragrantBob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1353526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragrantBob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Vetiver-69.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vetiver"title="Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1516894ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1516894" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353526">FragrantBob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-05">03/05/22 02:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1990s nostalgia in a bottle. Calvin Klein Eternity for Men is a fresh, citrusy, aromatic fragrance that is great for daytime, warm weather use and is suitable for for work, school, college, general daytime wear, out with friends etc. So it's reasonably versatile. The scent has been around for awhile but even after 30 years is still an acceptable fresh fragrance. Eternity for Men opens with citrus notes. The dry-down brings out some floral and fruity notes with a hint of woodiness underpinned by a warm musk. A nice green, fresh fragrance with a moderate performance, lasts about 4 hours on my skin and gives arm length projection. Perhaps it is the nostalgic effect but Eternity for Men gives me a vibe of unperturbed confidence while also conveying some carefree abandon. A classic that I'm glad to have in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1516894"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1516894#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509832" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tthoms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tthoms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-1974-2965.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2965.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman (1974)"title="Gentleman (1974)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509832ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509832" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446992">tthoms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-22">02/22/22 12:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm trying it for the first time.  A soft pleasant fragrance that smells of sweet vetiver.  Frankly, that's the only note I can put my finger on, and the prominant one for my nose.  <br />
<br />
This was a gift that I will happily wear, but at this point, I probably wouldn't rebuy.  Who knows?  After a couple of wearings I may change my mind.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1509832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1509832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1501499" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1501499" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stephen.redeker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1181238.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stephen.redeker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-Pure-Malt-6103.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6103.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men Pure Malt"title="A*Men Pure Malt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1501499ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1501499" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181238">stephen.redeker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-10">02/10/22 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Do yourself a favor and read the review below mine. I feel this way with other fragrances as well. Eternity doesn't actually last an eternity on my skin, but I really like this scent. Someone below said it smells like Chanel Platinum Egoist (without the strong metallic note) and I would totally agree; this is a softer version of that. This is a relic from the 90s that doesn't feel dated. It brings a smile to my face when I wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1501499"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1501499#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1489907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1489907" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anthonycball"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1273491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anthonycball" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Light-Blue-Forever-pour-Homme-66556.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66556.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"title="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1489907ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1489907" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273491">anthonycball</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-24">01/24/22 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An iconic herbal-aromatic Fougere. For my 100th fragrance review, I wanted it to be something special. CK Eternity. Over the course of my lifetime, my most worn and most nostalgic fragrance. <br />
<br />
While nowadays the EDP is a better interpretation of what Eternity used to be, this will always have a place in my heart.<br />
<br />
Burning nostalgia in a bottle. Eternity smells like first loves and first heartbreaks. It smells like best friends whom you thought you’d be friends with forever.<br />
<br />
It smells like a nervous middle schooler getting ready for a school dance; trying hard to mask the awkwardness with a few too many sprays.<br />
<br />
Eternity is picking up your High School sweetheart for a date on a Friday night; knowing that if you played your cards right, the evening might end in a long kiss… That somehow Eternity would help you succeed.<br />
<br />
Eternity is carefree times you somehow wish you could bottle, yet we’ve found a way with this timeless fragrance.<br />
<br />
Rating: 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1489907"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1489907#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1489828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1489828" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dmd63"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/560310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.560310.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dmd63" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1489828ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1489828" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/560310">dmd63</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-24">01/24/22 07:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a 200ml bottle so i can spray at will. This is one best scents ever made, the only problem is that it could be louder.<br />
Nevertheless, it is a wonderfull office scent, that, if sprayed right, lasts all day and fills a room.<br />
By far, the best of Calvin Klein. Love it, reminds me of my youth and the buzz when it came out.<br />
A sure classic that should be bought at least once!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1489828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1489828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1488122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1488122" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1488122ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1488122" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-21">01/21/22 15:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A better Chanel Platinum Egoiste. Less prominent metallic accord, which is turned up too much in the Chanel. Eternity came first anyway. The metallic accord is done about right in Eternity. You gotta love lavender well blended with aromatics.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1488122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1488122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1487705" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yessamin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/153205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.153205.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yessamin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tartine-et-Chocolat/Tartine-Chocolate-Ptimusc-85266.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85266.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tartine & Chocolate Ptimusc"title="Tartine & Chocolate Ptimusc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1487705ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1487705" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/153205">Yessamin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-21">01/21/22 03:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternity for men EDT is the fragrance that I associate  with my dad. To me this is why is so comforting. It is a very inofensive perfume but it is sophisticated at the same time.<br />
I can't pintpoint which kind of herbs are included in this but they work perfectly combined together. It is a well rounded perfume, a shame that the interest has weaned over the past decade but still I would consider it a classic.<br />
Well suited for all occasions, it is a love of mine.<br />
<br />
The tester card I found around my home says: <br />
Exhilarating, distinctive, classic.<br />
A refresing blend of green notes and masculine woods.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1487705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1487705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
