padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1473541" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GoddessNose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437686"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="GoddessNose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1473541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1473541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437686">GoddessNose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-30">12/30/21 21:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Typically thought of as a men's fragrance, it's so sexy I would wear it from time to time. I think most people would find this one a men's fragrance vs. unisex, though. I remember spraying it on my pillow when I first discovered it years ago - I as obsessed with this one in the early 90's. <br />
<br />
The fresh herbal ingredients mellow out the citrus, woods, and florals. The blend is exceptional. Eternity for Men is a good example of a successful men's fragrance that uses florals very well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1473541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1473541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1471529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1471529" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="btjohnston"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="btjohnston" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-9099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel"title="Bleu de Chanel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1471529ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1471529" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357450">btjohnston</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-27">12/27/21 23:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was one of my first real fragrance purchases and it's still in my collection. It lasts 2-3hrs on me which is perfect, it's cheap enough to respray often, but also gives the option of changing fragrances after a few hours. Very office safe, and a more affordable version of Chanel Platinum Egoiste (which I also have, and prefer).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1471529"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1471529#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1466080" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1466080" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nuhgwin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/593217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nuhgwin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1466080ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1466080" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/593217">Nuhgwin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-18">12/18/21 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft citrus opening. The lavender is a nice touch that tames the citrus.<br />
It's fresh, clean, floral, and pleasant. <br />
In my opinion, this is best used as an office scent that won't offend anyone. <br />
I personally love the drydown of this fragrance.<br />
Blind buy safe and is a very nice scent for the price point.<br />
Try it out!<br />
<br />
EDIT:<br />
I can see how this REMINDS people of Chanel Platinum Egoiste. It does remind me of it but much softer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1466080"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1466080#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1465855" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1465855" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="santeripe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1350593.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="santeripe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rania-J/Musc-Moschus-54877.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54877.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Moschus"title="Musc Moschus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1465855ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1465855" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350593">santeripe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-18">12/18/21 04:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a laundry version of Parfums de Marly Percival. This has a soft and pillowy, almost suffocating linen feel, while Percival has sharp fir resin. Otherwise they're identical to my nose. Dislike, because this general scent DNA reminds me of old cheap deodorants and shower gels. The association has faded a bit with wearing. But I remember last summer I literally had to scrub this off with cleanser because that deodorant association made me gag!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1465855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1465855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1465358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1465358" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ozyman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220383"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ozyman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-721.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.721.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme"title="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1465358ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1465358" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220383">Ozyman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-17">12/17/21 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well guys,<br />
In order to understand this "orchestra" perfume,<br />
You must not smell it directly or on the first moments after spray.<br />
Let it dry. <br />
Smell it behind, around, or above but not directly.<br />
This one, even after so many years, is still something special and genius.!<br />
Its complicated, and gives its wearer the most beautiful aura around him. <br />
Its an airy aura, floating and lift you up putting you closer to the sky.<br />
Smell it around - never direct.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1465358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1465358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1455704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It’s pleasant but doesn’t have much character. I bet this was way better back in the days before the reformulations.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1436774"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1436774#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1436653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1436653" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RealWen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406068.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RealWen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-Blossom-54574.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54574.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Her Blossom"title="Burberry Her Blossom"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1436653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1436653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406068">RealWen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-29">10/29/21 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is it just me who thinks this perfume dries down to something very nasty in summer? I desperately want to know what it is in some perfumes that are giving out this smell. Could it be cedarwood? Please let me know if you know. It also never fails to give me a massive headache every time I wear it. As a girl I really like the opening and I thought it could be a great freshy in summer. But I cannot stand the dry-down. I like the Eternity aqua a lot though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1436653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1436653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1433515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1433515" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StankFrank"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1338100.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="StankFrank" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Shams-Oud-12139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shams Oud"title="Shams Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1433515ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1433515" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338100">StankFrank</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-23">10/23/21 19:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Weak sauce. Smells great for an hour or 2 then it’s gone on my hot skin. I suppose it’s great for a non cologne person to wear to events, but then I doubt that guy wears any fragrance anyway. Smelled rich &amp; amazing years ago, but now smells thin and diluted with alcohol. I wonder what the current &amp; vintage concentrations are. Thankfully it’s dirt cheap so worth having around.<br />
<br />
Spray heavy &amp; pair with old spice steel titan deodorant to project a bit. Also good after the gym. Masculine. Best worn by a groomed guy with simple style. T-shirt jeans &amp; a shave or a shirt &amp; tie kinda guy. Women tend to love this one on me if they can smell it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1433515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1433515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1433477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It was spicey and brash and all that was Man!  Sadly now this is weak and watered down, a shell of what it was.  The recently released EDP while ok didn’t fill the void. I’ll remember how great it once was and move on, kinda sad!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1433477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1433477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1426295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; And it tok me straight to my youth! I Even think i did not own this but the DNA was everywher.. and still takes me to the teen disco. Smell wise i Will not buy it. Little to sharp for my liking. But still a great scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1426295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1426295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1422305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
This takes me back... 90's.<br />
<br />
For me it feels nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1419607"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1419607#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1413781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1413781" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ozyman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220383"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ozyman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-721.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.721.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme"title="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1413781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1413781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220383">Ozyman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-20">09/20/21 09:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just for the perspective :<br />
1999, summer.<br />
My best friend and i just finished 3 years service in the army.<br />
We flew from Tel Aviv to New York USA.<br />
In the duty free we bought CK Eternity at last after dreaming on it for months...<br />
The price in Israel was too high ($200).<br />
And we backpacked across usa for 3 months,<br />
Every night 3 spritz- not spending this liquid "gold"...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1413781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1413781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1412755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1412755" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chrisk252"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chrisk252" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cerruti/1881-Men-329.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.329.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1881 Men"title="1881 Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1412755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1412755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185528">chrisk252</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-18">09/18/21 11:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very underrated gem. Lovely fresh clean opening of citrus, lavender, and the feel of looking out over the ocean horizon. Perfect for spring or summer wearing a crisp white shirt. Not outdated, just forgotten because there's no marketing hype behind it. <br />
Scent: 9, Sillage: 7.5, Longevity: 7.5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1412755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1412755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1411582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1411582" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atomikbomb_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1211792.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atomikbomb_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Lady-Emblem-31425.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31425.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lady Emblem"title="Lady Emblem"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1411582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1411582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792">Atomikbomb_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-16">09/16/21 12:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love this men's fragrance! Always have, as far as I can recall. I've worn it occasionally throughout the years, and it was the first fragrance I ever purchased for my husband, he still has an old bottle. <br />
<br />
It's not something that I wear seriously, or would ever consider as *mine*, as it's decidedly masculine, but it is one of those things that are enjoyable to me to throw on at times. I enjoy just sitting around with this on, recalling memories 😊 I like to wear this at home, and it's truly beautiful outside in the sunlight. <br />
<br />
The lavender is fantastic, and the lemon is crisp and juicy in the opening. It's otherwise a melange of herbaceous notes, some wood and a bit of musk. Despite possibly undergoing some reformulation, this is still potent and high quality from a current sample I recently received.  It still kicks out and has more muscle than many new things, but isn't rude or obnoxious. It absolutely walks the line of being noticeable, yet not oppressive. It's distinct, yet crowd-pleasing. <br />
<br />
This is a wonderfully aromatic experience, the notes are very well blended. A little oldschool, yes, but not dated at all. To the contrary, this makes me sad in a way, because few men's releases feel as well done. It's strong, but unpretentious and casual. I'll always love it 🍋🌿</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1411582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1411582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1408507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1408507" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wizkid04"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1286903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wizkid04" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1408507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1408507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); Mainly citrus, lavander, woods and a little herbal.<br />
<br />
It's an old fragrance but doesn't feel outdated by any means. Performance is good not exceptional. Early 20's with a mature character or 25+.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1408507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1408507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1394057" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1394057" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Meaty0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/764450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Meaty0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pinaud-Clubman/Clubman-27322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Clubman"title="Clubman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1394057ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1394057" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); I thought I might have bought a fake because it only lasts and hour or two. It's cheap(ish) and needs to be since you have to reapply it every few hours. 4/10. Would not bother with again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1394057"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1394057#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1391885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1391885" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="annexation"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1125597"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1125597.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="annexation" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermès"title="Terre d'Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1391885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1391885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1125597">annexation</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-13">08/13/21 18:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>90's in a bottle. If you are looking for a more modern and less aquatic version of Eternity, definitely check out Alien Man as I feel they are adjacent. <br />
<br />
Eternity is a very nostalgic scent that has just enough of an edge to keep it from smelling too grandfatherly. In the opening it is sharp, slightly sour, smoky, and sweet. It dries down to smell like 90s themed freshies the likes of Acqua di Gio. A solid "like"; reliable but well-tread territory.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1391885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1391885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1383408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1383408" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marcjohn86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1250281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marcjohn86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-l-Homme-5521.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5521.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de l'Homme"title="La Nuit de l'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1383408ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1383408" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250281">Marcjohn86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-29">07/29/21 09:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just a classic, this is my first signature scent. I haven't worn it in 10 years I bet by now but I still remember wearing it for the first time and really enjoying it. I'll have to get a bottle, but I do remember it being a very intimate fragrance, definitely not very strong, definitely not very long lasting. I think I typically got about 3-4 hours of performance maybe from it with the first 2 being the only time in which anybody else could really smell it. Regardless, it's a very good scent and while I remember it to be very synthetic, it's synthetic in a way that's very pleasant and clean. Definitely worth having if you're a fan of 90s aquatics even though this isn't necessarily an aquatic itself it kind of has that fresh shower gel type of vibe. I would say if you're a fan of Platinum Egoiste and you want something similar check this out. It's not as good as Platinum Egoiste, but it's still a fantastic option that's about 1/4 of the price.<br />
<br />
I'd give this a solid 8/10, even with the relatively bad performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1383408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1383408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1373233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I got a sample of this so had to try it, definitely a pass for me. I don't pick up any individual notes other than unrealistic and headache-inducing lavender and citrus in the top. <br />
<br />
Pass for me, there are so many more exciting offerings out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1367372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1367372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1363221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1363221" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Corspin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350174"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1350174.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Corspin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1363221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1363221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350174">Corspin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-20">06/20/21 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like one of those lemony after gym kind of shower gels when you just put it on, with a bit of a hint of soap, but the smell luckily becomes a bit more natural after you wear it for a while in my opinion. It's nothing amazing but it's fresh, simple and cheap and in those respects it's pretty good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1363221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1363221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1362562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1362562" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheRealYuno"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheRealYuno" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1362562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1362562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); Basically if it has a CK logo on it, avoid at all costs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1362562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1362562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1361932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1361932" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colognefreak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="colognefreak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mercedes-Benz/Mercedes-Benz-Sign-Your-Attitude-75488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mercedes-Benz Sign Your Attitude"title="Mercedes-Benz Sign Your Attitude"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1361932ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1361932" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235409">colognefreak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-18">06/18/21 05:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yes, it is truly a “timeless classic.”<br />
A very unique fragrance that is still relevant today and it can be had at discounters in a 3.4 ounce size for $30-35. It’s a blind buy, no doubter that is suitable for just about any use.<br />
This one works well when sprayed on clothing and it performs best in the late spring, summer and early fall.<br />
Just buy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1361932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1361932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1356851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356851" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PierreLouis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169766"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169766.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PierreLouis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-16938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus"title="Pegasus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169766">PierreLouis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-08">06/08/21 22:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have tested the latest formulation on my hand and it made me think of Bolognese sauce. Pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1356851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1356851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354210" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354210" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Julianjoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Julianjoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354210ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354210" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347017">Julianjoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-04">06/04/21 00:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my go to scent since the early 90s. That would tell you how much I love this scent. However, the longevity and sillage of Eternity today are so underwhelming and disappointing. In fact, I am surprised to read reviews here that say otherwise. (I am in Sydney, Australia, and I buy mine from reputable retailers in the city). <br />
<br />
In the 90s, I could even smell the top and middle notes on my skin the next morning. Now, it's just 'alcohol', even after a few hours of spraying. In the early 2010s, I remember turning up at the work the next day, and my colleague could tell me if I were out the night before, by smelling Eternity on me. Well, either my body chemistry has drastically changed as I get older, or Eternity has seriously changed its formulation. <br />
<br />
This year, 2021, I finally gave up on Eternity and have now moved on to other scents. If anyone has an Eternity like scent to recommend, please let me know! (Nah, I don't think Wings, Egoiste Platinum or Green Irish Tweed smell anything like Eternity)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1354210"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1354210#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1344934" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; (If only Safari was this good!)<br />
I have a soft spot for CK fragrances and this is probably my favourite.  This is a classic and is in my all time Top 10!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1344934"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1344934#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1338598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
