padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329594">jcarolinajr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-05">05/05/21 10:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Women just adore this fragrance on me and I love it on me too! I drool in the thought of being eternal and enjoy those special, mystical thoughts when wearing it and radiating my own personal eternal aroma. Although I never wear too much, I have noticed that the combination of the fragrance and the body talc will create a spellbinding effect! Therefore, when going to the office I eliminate the body talc. However, at night or when you want to set an outrageous mode of sillage and what might happen after then by all means add the body talc and run! I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1337961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1337961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1333707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1333707" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liffy19"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329313"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329313.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liffy19" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Eau-de-Parfum-84094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"title="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1333707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1333707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329313">Liffy19</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-28">04/28/21 06:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an absolute classic, and the smell reminds me of school everyone's smelled of Eternity in school including me and I'm using it 35 years later.... Love it....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1333707"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1333707#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1322816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1322816" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scubasteve84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319978"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1319978.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scubasteve84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1322816ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1322816" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319978">Scubasteve84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-10">04/10/21 04:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Calvin Klein Eternity for men EDT<br />
Batch: TBA (2020)<br />
<br />
This is a classic, it's hard not to like. Sharp and fresh, green and herbaceous, sophisticated and worldly are some adjectives that come to mind.   <br />
<br />
I would say this is a day scent, good for the office probably best suited to those a little but older and more mature. It performs pretty well without shouting, it's not obnoxious but people will definitely know that you are wearing it. Leaves a decent scent trail, lasts 4-6 hours on skin. <br />
<br />
It doesn't really smell like anything else I have in my collection. So to me its unique. <br />
<br />
Seasonally I think it leans more toward Spring and Summer weather however I have been using it during our unusually warm Autumn here in New Zealand and it wasn't bad. <br />
<br />
The only thing I dislike is that the dry down can be a bit flat, it kind of fizzes out to this distant driftwood musk that is not so pleasant. I find that if I reapply after 4 hours (on lunchbreak at work) I get a reset effect that powers through until the end of my day. Best of all its reasonably priced and for that and all the reasons stated above this one will be in my collection for Eternity ;-)<br />
<br />
Scent Appeal: 7/10 - note if you're under 25 you might not appreciate this<br />
Sillage: 5.5/10 <br />
Longevity: 6.5/10<br />
Value: 9/10<br />
<br />
Overall: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1322816"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1322816#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1318328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1318328" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="byronius5"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1315008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1315008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="byronius5" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Eau-for-Men-22860.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.22860.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Eau for Men"title="Dior Homme Eau for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1318328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1318328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1315008">byronius5</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-02">04/02/21 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is Calvin Klein's best male fragrance release ever!  A true classic!  Though to me this fragrance = the 90s and all its glories, it is Timeless!  It never gets old, and I will always own a bottle of this. I still wear it at least once every couple of weeks.  So many memories of smelling this on just about every dad in the neighborhood where I grew up.  Now that I am those dads' age I can truly appreciate this awesome, versatile scent!  I don't believe this will ever go out of style.  It is great for any occasion, from doing chores around the house to that important business meeting to a cozy dinner date.  It works any time of year, day or night.  Performance-wise, I wish it lived up to its name, but that's ok; most fougeres don't last long on me anyway.  Longevity is decent though, a few hours, and I think it lasts longer on you if you spray it onto your clothes as well.  This is most definitely blind-buy worthy!  I think every man would do well to have at least  a sample size of this in his collection!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1318328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1318328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1315260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1315260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuperFragHead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255333"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1255333.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuperFragHead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Parfum-Cologne-57874.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57874.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Parfum Cologne"title="Scandal Pour Homme Parfum Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1315260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1315260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255333">SuperFragHead</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-27">03/27/21 23:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Of course, it's a cheapie but think about why it has survived all those years and still selling like hotcakes online even today. No matter how many people think it's dated, it's a timeless classic. Absolutely no question about that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1315260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1315260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="258" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1178396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1178396" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spompey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1080755.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spompey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Man-Eau-Fraiche-644.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.644.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Man Eau Fraiche"title="Versace Man Eau Fraiche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1178396ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1178396" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080755">spompey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-21">05/21/20 00:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The snobs are getting out of hand. You watch a few YouTube fragrance review videos and all of the sudden you’re too good for a classic, well liked fragrance (especially by the ladies) like Eternity?? Mind you, these are the same boys that are saying Aventus sucks now. As for Eternity... it is still a great fragrance, classic, but not too dated. It’s definitely the best CK has to offer and it won’t steer you wrong.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1178396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1178396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1489907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1489907" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anthonycball"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1273491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anthonycball" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Light-Blue-Forever-pour-Homme-66556.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66556.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"title="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1489907ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1489907" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273491">anthonycball</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-24">01/24/22 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An iconic herbal-aromatic Fougere. For my 100th fragrance review, I wanted it to be something special. CK Eternity. Over the course of my lifetime, my most worn and most nostalgic fragrance. <br />
<br />
While nowadays the EDP is a better interpretation of what Eternity used to be, this will always have a place in my heart.<br />
<br />
Burning nostalgia in a bottle. Eternity smells like first loves and first heartbreaks. It smells like best friends whom you thought you’d be friends with forever.<br />
<br />
It smells like a nervous middle schooler getting ready for a school dance; trying hard to mask the awkwardness with a few too many sprays.<br />
<br />
Eternity is picking up your High School sweetheart for a date on a Friday night; knowing that if you played your cards right, the evening might end in a long kiss… That somehow Eternity would help you succeed.<br />
<br />
Eternity is carefree times you somehow wish you could bottle, yet we’ve found a way with this timeless fragrance.<br />
<br />
Rating: 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1489907"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1489907#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1207690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This was his signature and i remember him by this. Though it's been 5 years after he passed away. As soon as i get a whiff of this, sweet memories comes flashing.<br />
<br />
Great memories.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="313337"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=313337#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697981" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619330">CkEeternity Lover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-28">11/28/22 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this fragrance, i remember when i went to chemist warehouse and asked if i could smell it. For some reason i got the dirtiest look from the worker and they said i quote "Are you serious, do you actually want to fucking smell this shit." I said yes ofc i do! I remember the worker pinching his nose, while he sprayed it onto the test strip. As soon as i smelt it i snatched it out of his hand and sprayed all over me. "I LOVE THIS" i screamed and ran to counter with the biggest smile on my face and payed for it. I am still yet to smell a better fragrance at 75 years old, this fragrance is gonna get buried with me and poured all over my coffin. I also named my dog Eternity after this amazing scent 10/10 would highly recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1697981"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1697981#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="258" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1338598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1338598" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tima91"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1326068.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tima91" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1338598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1338598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326068">Tima91</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-06">05/06/21 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a woman I find this headache inducing. I can understand the mass appeal but its sharp to me the dry down is slightly woody but nowhere near as smooth as I thought it would be. Unfortunately this smells similar to other drugstore brands and I just have a memory of like car rides with my parents and being car sick.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1338598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1338598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354210" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354210" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Julianjoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Julianjoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354210ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354210" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347017">Julianjoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-04">06/04/21 00:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my go to scent since the early 90s. That would tell you how much I love this scent. However, the longevity and sillage of Eternity today are so underwhelming and disappointing. In fact, I am surprised to read reviews here that say otherwise. (I am in Sydney, Australia, and I buy mine from reputable retailers in the city). <br />
<br />
In the 90s, I could even smell the top and middle notes on my skin the next morning. Now, it's just 'alcohol', even after a few hours of spraying. In the early 2010s, I remember turning up at the work the next day, and my colleague could tell me if I were out the night before, by smelling Eternity on me. Well, either my body chemistry has drastically changed as I get older, or Eternity has seriously changed its formulation. <br />
<br />
This year, 2021, I finally gave up on Eternity and have now moved on to other scents. If anyone has an Eternity like scent to recommend, please let me know! (Nah, I don't think Wings, Egoiste Platinum or Green Irish Tweed smell anything like Eternity)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="1354210"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=1354210#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent113945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc113945" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JustinV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36231"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36231.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JustinV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Opium-Pour-Homme-562.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.562.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opium Pour Homme"title="Opium Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma113945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd113945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36231">JustinV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2010-12-03">12/03/10 20:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin:<br />
Top: Fresh, clean, citrus-y scent. 1-4 hours, depending on the weather, colds ones on 1, hot ones on 4.<br />
<br />
Middle: under-powered appealing flowery scent, with some woody scent (I don't know if it is rosewood, maple wood, X wood, Y wood, I don't really care, if it smells like wood, then its wood to me); which is kind of appealing. 2-3 hours.<br />
<br />
Base: Many people say there are traces of strong-woody scent on it, but hey, I don't have it. middle notes and base notes are just the same on my skin. 1 hour.<br />
<br />
For sure its a complement getter (70% likes, 30% hates). Its a classic, aquatic top note, flowery and woody on the base. Still modern until today.<br />
<br />
Very versatile, I can use this at work out with friends, going for a date, etc.<br />
But not in clubs.<br />
<br />
If you are into aquatics and flowery gentlemen scent, this is most probably something to BUY. Or if you are curious, give it a shoot on your skin.<br />
<br />
The country I am in has no 4 seasons, so it is either hot or cold weather. This works very well on both.<br />
<br />
My rating (base on 5 stars)<br />
<br />
Scent: 1 (ho ho ho, many people are gonna hate me for this, but sorry to say this, this is EVERY GUYS scent in my place, its not unique, people will know this for sure).<br />
<br />
Sillage: 3-4 (not offending, sitting quietly when doing nothing, pumps up when you are walking).<br />
<br />
Time length: 2-3 (I get yo-yo time length on this, sometimes 4 hours, sometimes 8).<br />
<br />
Occasion: 4 (You can use on any occasion. BUT not for clubs for sure, its disgusting when you use this in clubs).<br />
<br />
Overall base on mathematics: 2.5 @ 3/5<br />
<br />
SUPER DUPER COMMON SMELL IN MY PLACE, EVERY GUY HAS IT. I am a big fan of unique things... so this one? I gave it to a friend of mine after like....5% usage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="113945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=113945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent444245" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc444245" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GRAF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.727556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GRAF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-Haarlem-3258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New Haarlem"title="New Haarlem"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma444245ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd444245" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727556">GRAF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-01-08">01/08/14 16:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can't stand this scent it is suffocating. Not for me. I suggest try before buy. The skin reacts different in people. Don't depend on reviews only.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="444245"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=444245#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent842220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc842220" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LayneDad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LayneDad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenneth-Cole/Connected-Kenneth-Cole-Reaction-12941.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12941.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Connected Kenneth Cole Reaction"title="Connected Kenneth Cole Reaction"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma842220ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd842220" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009615">LayneDad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-17">07/17/17 14:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had this during the late 90s, one of my very first perfumes when I started office work. Loved it, got many compliments.<br />
<br />
Twenty years later, I got no love for this anymore, although I bought a set of CK small bottle perfumes just for the nostalgia.<br />
<br />
Overall a good scent, moderate performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="258"comment_id="842220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html?ccid=842220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="258" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">60.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Roja-Dove.html" class="en2inter">Roja Dove</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
                            <div style="clear: bottom; margin-top: 1rem;"></div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
